option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<Project Sdk="Microsoft.NET.Sdk">
<PropertyGroup> <TargetFramework>netstandard2.0</TargetFramework> <Nullable>enable</Nullable> <LangVersion>latest</LangVersion> <EnforceExtendedAnalyzerRules>true</EnforceExtendedAnalyzerRules> <IsRoslynComponent>true</IsRoslynComponent> <RootNamespace>Godot.Globalizer</RootNamespace> <PackageId>Godot.Globalizer</PackageId> <Version>0.1.0</Version> <Authors>YourName</Authors> <Description>Source generator that creates [GlobalClass] Godot wrapper nodes for classes annotated with [GlobalizerWrap].</Description> <PackageLicenseExpression>MIT</PackageLicenseExpression> <RepositoryUrl>https://example.com/yourrepo</RepositoryUrl> <PackageReadmeFile>Readme.md</PackageReadmeFile> <PublishRepositoryUrl>true</PublishRepositoryUrl> <EmbedUntrackedSources>true</EmbedUntrackedSources> <IncludeSymbols>true</IncludeSymbols> <SymbolPackageFormat>snupkg</SymbolPackageFormat> <GeneratePackageOnBuild>true</GeneratePackageOnBuild> <PackageType>Analyzer</PackageType> <IsPackable>true</IsPackable> <PackageTags>Godot;SourceGenerator;Analyzer;GlobalClass;Wrapper</PackageTags> </PropertyGroup>
<ItemGroup> <None Include="Readme.md" Pack="true" PackagePath="/" /> </ItemGroup>
<ItemGroup> <PackageReference Include="Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Analyzers" Version="3.3.4"> <PrivateAssets>all</PrivateAssets> <IncludeAssets>runtime; build; native; contentfiles; analyzers; buildtransitive</IncludeAssets> </PackageReference> <PackageReference Include="Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp" Version="4.3.0" /> <PackageReference Include="Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Workspaces" Version="4.3.0" /> <PackageReference Include="Microsoft.SourceLink.GitHub" Version="8.0.0" PrivateAssets="All" /> </ItemGroup>
<ItemGroup> <Folder Include="Properties\" /> </ItemGroup>
<ItemGroup> <ProjectReference Include="..\..\Godot.Globalizer.Abstractions\Godot.Globalizer.Abstractions.csproj" /> </ItemGroup>
</Project>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<Project Sdk="Microsoft.NET.Sdk">
<PropertyGroup> <TargetFramework>netstandard2.0</TargetFramework> <Nullable>enable</Nullable> <LangVersion>latest</LangVersion> <EnforceExtendedAnalyzerRules>true</EnforceExtendedAnalyzerRules> <IsRoslynComponent>true</IsRoslynComponent> <RootNamespace>Godot.Globalizer</RootNamespace> <PackageId>Godot.Globalizer</PackageId> <Version>0.1.0</Version> <Authors>YourName</Authors> <Description>Source generator that creates [GlobalClass] Godot wrapper nodes for classes annotated with [GlobalizerWrap].</Description> <PackageLicenseExpression>MIT</PackageLicenseExpression> <RepositoryUrl>https://example.com/yourrepo</RepositoryUrl> <PackageReadmeFile>Readme.md</PackageReadmeFile> <PublishRepositoryUrl>true</PublishRepositoryUrl> <EmbedUntrackedSources>true</EmbedUntrackedSources> <IncludeSymbols>true</IncludeSymbols> <SymbolPackageFormat>snupkg</SymbolPackageFormat> <GeneratePackageOnBuild>true</GeneratePackageOnBuild> <PackageType>Analyzer</PackageType> <IsPackable>true</IsPackable> <PackageTags>Godot;SourceGenerator;Analyzer;GlobalClass;Wrapper</PackageTags> </PropertyGroup>
<ItemGroup> <None Include="Readme.md" Pack="true" PackagePath="/" /> </ItemGroup>
<ItemGroup> <PackageReference Include="Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Analyzers" Version="3.3.4"> <PrivateAssets>all</PrivateAssets> <IncludeAssets>runtime; build; native; contentfiles; analyzers; buildtransitive</IncludeAssets> </PackageReference> <PackageReference Include="Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp" Version="4.3.0" /> <PackageReference Include="Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Workspaces" Version="4.3.0" /> <PackageReference Include="Microsoft.SourceLink.GitHub" Version="8.0.0" PrivateAssets="All" /> </ItemGroup>
<ItemGroup> <Folder Include="Properties\" /> </ItemGroup>
<ItemGroup> <ProjectReference Include="..\..\Godot.Globalizer.Abstractions\Godot.Globalizer.Abstractions.csproj" /> </ItemGroup>
</Project>
